    • setPreGameChoice

      public void setPreGameChoice​(java.util.ArrayList<LeaderCard> leaders, int numberOfResources)
      Sets leadercards image, and eventually make the choose resource visible
      Overrides:
      setPreGameChoice in class GuiController
      Parameters:
      leaders - the 4 available leaders coming from the server
      numberOfResources - the amount of resources that the player has to choose
